metadata.Title: CVE-2023-34966 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An infinite loop vulnerability was found in Samba's mdssvc RPC service forSpotlight. When parsing Spotlight mdssvc RPC packets sent by the client,the core unmarshalling function sl_unpack_loop() did not validate a fieldin the network packet that contains the count of elements in an array-likestructure. By passing 0 as the count value, the attacked function will runin an endless loop consuming 100% CPU. This flaw allows an attacker toissue a malformed RPC request, triggering an infinite loop, resulting in adenial of service condition.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-34966` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ctdb - 2:4.18.5+dfsg-1ubuntu1
libnss-winbind - 2:4.18.5+dfsg-1ubuntu1
libpam-winbind - 2:4.18.5+dfsg-1ubuntu1
libsmbclient - 2:4.18.5+dfsg-1ubuntu1
libwbclient0 - 2:4.18.5+dfsg-1ubuntu1
python3-samba - 2:4.18.5+dfsg-1ubuntu1
registry-tools - 2:4.18.5+dfsg-1ubuntu1
samba - 2:4.18.5+dfsg-1ubuntu1
samba-ad-dc - 2:4.18.5+dfsg-1ubuntu1
samba-ad-provision - 2:4.18.5+dfsg-1ubuntu1
samba-common - 2:4.18.5+dfsg-1ubuntu1
samba-common-bin - 2:4.18.5+dfsg-1ubuntu1
samba-dsdb-modules - 2:4.18.5+dfsg-1ubuntu1
samba-libs - 2:4.18.5+dfsg-1ubuntu1
samba-testsuite - 2:4.18.5+dfsg-1ubuntu1
samba-vfs-modules - 2:4.18.5+dfsg-1ubuntu1
smbclient - 2:4.18.5+dfsg-1ubuntu1
winbind - 2:4.18.5+dfsg-1ubuntu1
ldb-tools - 2:2.7.2+samba4.18.5+dfsg-1ubuntu1
libldb2 - 2:2.7.2+samba4.18.5+dfsg-1ubuntu1
python3-ldb - 2:2.7.2+samba4.18.5+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: samba package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:4.18.5+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
